TopicTitle: Please help! Major throttle issues after .25 update!

Articles.Content:
I'm a major noob to KSP and absolutely LOVE this game, however, I am at the end of my patience with it. I had one heck of a "space empire'' going, and then with no warning the update (.25) deleted all my save files, thanks. And now when i setup my joystick (extreme 3d pro), the throttle will not stay where I put it. As an example, if I set the throttle at 1/4, it drops off to 0, BY ITSELF. Same story in the 3/4 position, only instead of it dropping off it goes up by itself. The only two positions it seems to stay in place, is either half way or full throttle.... I'm sure I don't Have to explain to any of you guys/gals why this would be such a problem. Also as a side note, the left shift and control keys use to work in unison with the joystick throttle, now the left shift and control don't work at all. And yes I made sure they were assigned properly.

I appreciate any info I can get, and I did search!

This should probably be in the support forum?

In any case, maybe something like AltInput or AFBW might help?
Thread moved to the appropriate forum

Sorry I was in a major panic when I posted this....

But at any rate, it worked fine before the .25 update, i didn't have any issues. But now....
